lines.text: We're super sure there was actually a fire in here?
W-what do you mean, actually a fire? Of course there was!
Curious to know why you'd ask, kid.
I mean, if we're suspecting that Opal tampered with the evidence, are we sure she didn't fake the fire somehow?
That- that's ridiculous, even for you.
Officer Fleini, this child's w-wild guesswork is a waste of the department's time. You ought to put this paranoid f-fantasy to bed.
I hate to say it, Seeker, but I saw the fire with my own two eyes.
Burnin' in the window when we got here. Went out by itself before the trucks got here, though.
A-and before I ever entered the room. So- so I'm- your accusation is impossible.
Sheesh, alright! I was just checking! No need to bite my head off!
